Verses: 1 padhinoraam Varusham Moondraam Maadham Mudhalaanthedhiyile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 manupuththirane, Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonodum Avanudaiya Thiralaana Janaththodum Nee Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Nee Un Magaththuvaththile Yaarukku Oppaayirukkiraai?

3 idho, Aseeriyan Leebanonile Alangaarak Koppugalodum, Nizhalidum Thazhaigalodum, Valarndhongiya Kedhuru Virutchamaayirundhaan; Adhin Kilaigalin Thazhaigalukkulle Adhin Nunikkozhundhu Uyarndhirundhadhu.
4 thanneergal Adhaip Peridhum, Aazham Adhai Uyarththiyum Aakkina; Adhin Aarugal Adhin Adimaraththai Sutrilum Odina; Than Neerkkaalgalai Veliyin Virutchangalukkellaam Paayavittadhu
5 aagaiyaal Veliyin Sagala Virutchangalilum Adhu Migavum Uyarndhadhu; Adhu Thulirvidugaiyil Thiralaana Thanneerinaal Adhin Kilaigal Perugi, Adhin Koppugal Neelamaayina.
6 adhin Koppugalil Aagaayaththin Paravaigalellaam Koodukattina; Adhin Koppugalinkeezh Veliyin Mirugangalellaam Kuttigalaippottana; Peridhaana Sagalajaadhigalum Adhin Nizhalile Kudiyirundhaargal.
7 appadiye Adhin Ver Thiralaana Thanneergalaruge Irundhadhinaal Adhu Than Sezhippinaalum Than Koppugalin Neelaththinaalum Alangaaramaayirundhadhu.

8 dhevanudaiya Vanaththilulla Kedhurukkal Adhai Maraikkak Koodaadhirundhadhu; Dhevadhaaru Virutchangal Adhin Koppugalukku Samaanamalla; Armon Marangal Adhin Kilaigalukku Nigaralla; Dhevanudaiya Vanaththilulla Oru Virutchamum Alangaaraththile Adharku Oppalla.
9 adhin Kilaigalin Thiralinaal Adhai Alangariththen; Dhevanudaiya Vanamaagiya Edhenin Virutchangalellaam Adhinperil Poraamaikondana.

10 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Adhu Than Valarththiyile Mettimaiyaagi, Koppugalin Thazhaigalukkulle Than Nunikkilaiyai Ongavittapadiyinaalum, Adhin Irudhayam Than Mettimaiyinaal Uyarndhuponapadiyinaalum,
11 naan Adhai Jaadhigalil Magaa Vallamaiyullavan Kaiyile Oppukkoduththen; Avan Thanakku Ishtamaanapadi Adharku Seyvaan; Adhinudaiya Akkiramaththinimiththam Adhaith Thallippotten.

12 jaadhigalil Vallavaraagiya Anniyadhesaththaar Adhai Vettippottu, Vittupponaargal; Adhin Koppugal Malaigalinmelum Sagala Pallaththaakkugalilum Vizhundhana; Adhin Kilaigal Dhesaththinudaiya Ellaa Aarugalinaruge Murindhana; Boomiyilulla Janangalellaarum Adhin Nizhalaivittuk Kalaindhuponaargal.
13 vizhundhukidakkira Adhinmel Aagaayaththup Paravaigalellaam Thaabariththana; Adhin Kombugalinmel Veliyin Mirugangalellaam Thangina.

14 thanneerin Oramaai Valarugira Endha Virutchangalum Thangal Uyaraththinaale Mettimaikollaamalum, Thangal Koppugalin Thazhaikkulle Thangal Nunikkilaiyai Ongavidaamalum, Thanneeraik Kudikkira Endha Marangalum Thangal Uyarththiyinaale Thangalmel Nambikkai Vaikkaamalum Irukkum Poruttu Ippadi Seyven; Manupuththirarin Naduve Avargal Ellaarum Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargalodekooda Maranaththukku Oppukkodukkappattu, Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalil Ponaargal.

15 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Avan Paadhaalaththil Irangugira Naalile Pulambalai Varuviththen; Naan Avanimiththam Aazhaththai Moodippottu, Thiralaana Thanneergal Odaadhapadikku Adhin Aarugalai Adaiththu, Adhinimiththam Leebanonai Iruladaiyappanninen; Veliyin Virutchangalellaam Avanimiththam Pattuppoyina.

16 naan Avanaik Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargalodekoodap Paadhaalaththil Irangappannugaiyil, Avan Vizhugira Saththaththinaal Jaadhigalai Adhirappanninen; Appozhudhu Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalil Edhenin Virutchangalum, Leebanonin Menmaiyaana Sirandha Virutchangalum, Thanneer Kudikkum Sagala Marangalum Aarudhal Adaindhana.
17 avanodekooda Ivargalum Jaadhigalin Naduve Avan Nizhalil Kudiyirundhu Avanukku Puyabalamaayirundhavargalum, Pattayaththaal Vettundavargalandaiyile Paadhaalaththil Iranginaargal.

18 ippadippatta Magimaiyilum Magaththuvaththilum Edhenin Virutchangalil Nee Edharku Oppaanavan? Edhenin Virutchangalode Neeyum Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalil Irakkappattu, Pattayaththaale Vettundavargalodekooda Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalin Naduvile Kidappaai; Paarvonum Avan Koottamum Idhuve Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
